Package cs2030s.fp

Class InfiniteList<T>

java.lang.Object
cs2030s.fp.InfiniteList<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
InfiniteList.End
public class InfiniteList<T> extends Object
The class InfiniteList, created to build a list with possibly an infinite number of elements. It is done using lazy evaluation.
